Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Note Sgh-i717
Reviews.Author: Shelly N Martin
Reviews.Content: The phone looked great, however the phone has been slow and freezing a lot. I wish I could get another one.

Reviews.Title: I simply LOVE my Note!
Reviews.Author: Henry R.
Reviews.Content: I simply love my note! I love to draw and this is perfect for it! the S Pen is what makes buy it. sorry for my English

ProductInfo.Features: Android OS, v2.3 (Gingerbread), upgradable to v4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Note Sgh-i717 Black At&t 4g LTE Unlocked Cell Phone No Warranty - At&t Logos [At&t Retail Packaging]
